Text.val: Author: Jerry Janssens (JJ)
Creation Date: 28.06.2001
14.03.2013 JH SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
09.10.2012 SH SCR17574 Changed Blob Ansi to Unicode blob (CREM)
22.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
19.05.2006 SH SR11295 Changed control field to modifiy CREM_NOTICE from RTF to
normal Edit control
23.08.2005 SH SCR8889 Added proper transaction/locking strategy to "Main Screen"
22.08.2005 SH SCR8889 Removed transaction/locking from task "Main Screen", be-
cause of DBSQL errors in combination with BLOB fields.
25.04.2005 JJ SCR8063 Enter on admn/clnt = next field
delete button replaced by delete of empty blob
08.03.2005 SH SCR7888 Added new para i.CremType (304=OSP001B, 316=OPH202A)
20.05.2003 JJ SCR3194 new button handling
23.01.2003 JJ implemented new authorization/screen title concept
20.11.2001 JJ removed some bugs in the flow control which previously
wasn't tested tested because of gateway blob-bug
14.11.2001 JJ SCR#242 Added Clear KbB (TP) in case of remaining exits
C: Undo changes and exit
.. rollback isn;t needed, since changes are to virtual...
S: Save changes and exit
ADMN and CLNTID only accessible if notice wasn't changed
-- Notice only modifiable for authorised users parkable for all if client
exists
@ Uses alpha 10000 field to avoid problems with copy/paste from e. g. MS Word
because if using an RFT control also the formating is stored to CREM_NOTICE
If CREM_NOTICE is used for output (e.g. BXA406) the formating triggers are
written to XML. Magic only ignores this formating parts if the blob field is
used in online programs
MsgBoxRet = 'Y', WTD='S'
MsgBoxRet ='C', return online

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('SCR[OSP006]: Notes about invoice entry / payment entry')
